title: No Business of Ours (2C44)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot an [Isengard] minion. Plays to your support area. The Free Peoples player may not look at or reveal cards in any Shadow player's hand.
Lore:	”'Goblins? Cobblers! Far-off tales and children's stories, that's all that is!'”
Rarity:	C
